attributes.action: Give high school students a minimum of a week to complete homework
attributes.background: Give students more than a week to complete homework. If students have less than a week to do homework they are more likely to rush and will not take in all the nessecary information. Especially if they have lots of homework to do and not a lot of time to do it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because is about something the UK Government and Parliament isn't responsible for.

This is the responsibility of the school.
